trait.name: Tightly Packed
entries: If the cavalry block is effected by an area of effect attack that covers more than one square it is occupying, it receives double the damage.

trait.name: Multiattack
entries: The cavalry block can make two lance attacks.

trait.name: Mounted
entries: The cavalry block can dash using its bonus action.

action.name: Lance
entries: 10ft range, +7, {@dice 2d12 + 8} piercing ({@dice 1d12 + 4} is block has less than half of max hit points).
